reg_info.act_under: Supporting Retention in Public Services Act, 2022

content.content: 1. The temporary compensation enhancement program set out in the document entitled “Temporary Retention Incentive for Nurses Program”, available on a website of the Government of Ontario, as that document may be amended from time to time, is prescribed.
content.raw_html: 1. The temporary compensation enhancement program set out in the document entitled “Temporary Retention Incentive for Nurses Program”, available on a website of the Government of Ontario, as that document may be amended from time to time, is prescribed.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
